levels.description:
Passive Effect: Deployment <@ba.vup>does not consume</> deployment slots. 
After deployment, ATK <@ba.vup>+{atk:0%}</> and gain <@ba.vup>{times}</> <$ba.shield>Shields</>. After the skill duration, automatically retreat and extend Redeployment Time by <@ba.vup>{value:0%}</>. If the previously deployed Operator is from Kazimierz, the Redeployment Time <@ba.vup>will not be extended</>
